::KitKat::

"Not quite what I had in mind, but it's plan at least." She had a 
nervous smile on her face. "But Thank you for your suggestion 
Etchingar."

She rubbed hand on er forehead.  Being a leader isn't as easy as it 
looks.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Etchingar laughed excitedly.
> 
> "Yeah, I say we go and get some alcohol, or something, then we 
party some,
> but then, we go to the ship, and we say we have some beer for them, 
and they
> come out, then we break the bottles over their heads, then, and 
then, then,
> we and, we, somehow get past the defenses, then we threaten them 
that we
> will kick their asses if they don't let us have the base! Cool, 
huh?"
> Etchingar finished. He stared smiling at KitKat...
